accept_tutorial: Read the instructions and finish the tutorial
add_pink_dresses: Add two units of the product "Pink Summer Dress" (size M) to shopping cart
offer_green_coat: Search and apply free code to the product "Green Coat"
add_green_coat: Add the product "Green Coat" to shopping cart
add_bomber_jacket: Add the product "Bomber Jacket" to favorites and shopping cart
delete_item: Delete the product "Green Coat" from shopping cart
make_purchase: Buy shopping cart and fill in the shipping information
